description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 18/12913/FUL(Erection of 8 no. dwellings comprising 3 no. three-bedroom terraced houses and 5 no. apartments within a two storey block with accommodation within the roof) to amend the drawings of the 3x approved houses to facilitate rear alterations.
decision_conditions: The proposed changes, including enlarged footprint of houses at first and second floor and introduction of rear access gates, are materially different from the development approved by planning permission 18/12913/FUL.

Please be advised that you are unable to submit an application with both ownership certificates A and B signed.Kindly only sign Certificate B, ensuring that notice has been served to the owners of the land, and delete your completion of Certificate A.

In dealing with the application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive way.  We have made available detailed advice in the form or our statutory policies in the Core Strategy, Supplementary Planning Documents, Planning Briefs and other informal written guidance, as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Appropriate works to reduce, reshape and maintain a Yew which has been poorly manages and grown very tall and misshapen whilst impacting on adjacent buildings.Recommendation:No Objections.
